meanings.definition: A person who carries a ball.
meanings.sent1: The young boy was the ballcarriers during the game of catch.
meanings.sent2: The football team's ballcarriers ran swiftly towards the end zone.
meanings.sent3: The little dog decided to become the ballcarriers and carried the tennis ball around the yard.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, we are all ballcarriers, trying to advance towards our goals.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ballcarriers racing down the field stayed in my mind long after the game ended.

meanings.definition: The players on a sports team responsible for advancing the ball.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team's ballcarriers worked together to move the ball towards the goal.
meanings.sent2: The basketball ballcarriers passed the ball skillfully to outmaneuver the opponents.
meanings.sent3: The ballcarriers on the rugby team decided to have a race to see who could advance the ball the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The ballcarriers on the hockey team were like knights charging towards the opponent's goal.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the ballcarriers for their determination and teamwork during the match.
